verbs.description: [V: Popcorn] [ARGM-LOC: at the ready] ? I ’ve got my spud space reserved since I intend to be glued to the TV when Donald Trump is indicted and much to his surprise finds out he ca n’t pardon himself . WaPo reporters may be chaffing at the bit for Special Counsel ...
